mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(toc.fOperationCombineName, '_____', toc.fUuid) FROM t_operation_combine toc WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM t_group g WHERE g.fOperationCombineUuid = toc.fUuid ) AND toc.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} ORDER BY toc.fOperationCombineName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_operation_combine(fOperationCombineName, fTerminalType, fCreator, fMaxInvalidCount) VALUES(#{operationCombineName}, #{terminalType}, #{creator}, #{maxInvalidCount})
mapper.select: SELECT toc.fUuid AS 'uuid', toc.fRemainingAccount AS 'remainingAccount', toc.fMaxInvalidCount AS 'maxInvalidCount', g.fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime' FROM t_group g LEFT JOIN t_operation_combine toc ON toc.fUuid = g.fOperationCombineUuid WHERE toc.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} AND g.fGroupName = #{groupName} LIMIT 1
SELECT toc.fOperationCombineName AS 'operationCombineName' FROM t_group g LEFT JOIN t_operation_combine toc ON toc.fUuid = g.fOperationCombineUuid WHERE g.fGroupName = #{optimizeGroupName} LIMIT 1
